Class RegisterServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • RegisterServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class RegisterServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    Register Servlet is used to collect the user submitted form data and call various methods to validate the data. Depending on the outcome of validation it will either request user information again or redirect to succesfull register page
    Author:
    Brodie
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
